posts.post_content: Great in an "Old Testament" themed [Kaalia of the Vast](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kaalia of the Vast) EDH deck. Slaughtering goats to power out angels and demons is almost as fun as casting [Ashes to Ashes](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ashes to Ashes) and [Dust to Dust](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dust to Dust) one after the other.

posts.post_content: I run it in my Kresh EDH. It does next to nothing for Kresh himself but considering I run a good quarter of the deck with mana ramping, I like to have something to waste mana on during those slow, political games. Like someone else said, 0/1s don't draw much attention. They are also good devour targets for a surprise [Predator Dragon](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Predator Dragon). :-D
